member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IApplication
member.summary: Interface for created applications in the umbraco backoffice

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IApplicationStartupHandler
member.summary: Any class that implements this interface will be instantiated at application startup
member.remarks: NOTE: It is not recommended to use this interface and instead use IApplicationEventHandler and bind to any custom events in the OnApplicationInitialized method.

member.summary: Summary description for ActionI.

member.name: P:umbraco.interfaces.IAction.JsSource
member.summary: A path to a supporting JavaScript file for the IAction. A script tag will be rendered out with the reference to the JavaScript file.

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.ICacheRefresher
member.summary: The IcacheRefresher Interface is used for loadbalancing.

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IDataValueSetter
member.summary: Internal interface used to decorate any IData that can be optimized when exporting XML like in the packaging service. Instead of relying on the IData to go get the value from the db, any IData that implements this can have it's value set from the packaging service.

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IData
member.summary: The IData is part of the IDataType interface for creating new data types in the umbraco backoffice. The IData represents the actual value entered by the user.

member.summary: Gets or sets the property id.

member.summary: Creates a new value

member.summary: Deletes this instance.

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IDataEditor
member.summary: The IDataEditor is part of the IDataType interface for creating new data types in the umbraco backoffice. The IDataEditor represents the editing UI for the Data Type.

member.name: M:umbraco.interfaces.IDataEditor.Save
member.summary: Saves this instance.

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IDataPrevalue
member.summary: The IDataPrevalue interface is part of the IDataType interface for creating new data types in the umbraco backoffice. The IDataPrevalue represents the editing UI for adding prevalues to the datatype.

member.summary: Saves this instance.

member.name: P:umbraco.interfaces.IDataPrevalue.Editor
member.summary: Gets the editor control.

member.name: T:umbraco.interfaces.IDataType
member.summary: The IDataType is a interface used for adding a new Data type to the umbraco backoffice. It consists of IdataEditor which provides the Editing UI, the IDataPrevalue which provides prevalues and th their editing UI And finally it contains IData which manages the actual data in the Data Type

member.summary: Gets the id.

member.summary: Gets the name of the data type.

member.summary: Gets or sets the data type definition id.

member.name: P:umbraco.interfaces.IDataWithPreview.PreviewMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether preview mode is switched on. In preview mode, the setter saves to a temporary location instead of persistent storage, which the getter also reads from on subsequent access. Switching off preview mode restores the persistent value.
member.value: true if preview mode is switched on; otherwise, false.
